#summary Describes jxmpp-bot lifecycle

= Activity diagram =

http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/9259/mainlifecycleactivity.png

= Description =

After bot process has been started up [Initialization initialization] occurs. Then using provided initialization information, bot attempts to connect to remote xmpp server.

If connection is established, bot attempts to join groupchat, otherwise error information will be written into bot application log. 

If bot has successfully joined groupchat, it starts its main loop.
